",["$r","p",null,{"children":"以 Debian/Ubuntu 安装为例，举例如下："}],"
",["$r","CodeBlock",null,{"menus":[{"title":"版本","items":[["8.x",{"version":"8.x"}],["7.x",{"version":"7.x"}],["6.x",{"version":"6.x"}]]}],"code":"wget -qO - https://artifacts.elastic.co/GPG-KEY-elasticsearch | {{sudo}}gpg --dearmor -o /usr/share/keyrings/elasticsearch-keyring.gpg
echo "deb [signed-by=/usr/share/keyrings/elasticsearch-keyring.gpg] {{http_protocol}}{{mirror}}/{{version}}/apt/ stable main" | {{sudo}}tee /etc/apt/sources.list.d/elastic-{{version}}.list
{{sudo}}apt-get update && {{sudo}}apt-get install elasticsearch","codeLanguage":"bash"}]]}]
